item.title: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma and Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar digital pre-orders now available; new trailers
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/rune-factory-guardians-of-azuma-and-story-of-seasons-grand-bazaar-digital-pre-orders-now-available-new-trailers

  • PC
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

All the editions and downloadable content available at launch.

Marvelous, Marvelous USA, and Marvelous Europe have opened digital pre-orders for Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma and Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar for Switch 2 and Switch.

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma is due out for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on June 5. Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar will follow for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 27.

Here are the pre-order details:

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma

  • ❮
  • ❯

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma, is scheduled for launch on June 5 and can be pre-ordered on the Nintendo eShop for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. The standard edition will be available to pre-order for $59.99 on Nintendo Switch and $69.99 for Nintendo Switch 2. A Digital Deluxe edition will be available to pre-order for $69.98 on Nintendo Switch; and a Super Digital Deluxe edition for $79.98 on Nintendo Switch.

At launch, Nintendo Switch 2 players can upgrade their Nintendo Switch 2 standard edition with a “Digital Deluxe” downloadable content set for $9.99, or a “Super Digital Deluxe” downloadable content set for $19.99.

The Nintendo Switch 2 Upgrade Pack will also be available for pre-order for $10 for anyone that owns either the physical or digital Nintendo Switch version of Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma. All digital versions of the game will come with the “Rune Factory 4 Hero Outfit Bundle” as a special bonus. The full details of each digital edition are available below.

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma Digital Standard Edition (pre-order on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2; wishlist on PC)

  • Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma base game
  • Subaru’s Rune Factory 4 Outfit (Lest), Kaguya’s Rune Factory 4 Outfit (Frey)

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma Digital Deluxe Edition (pre-order on Nintendo Switch; wishlist on PC)

  • Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma base game
  • Subaru’s Rune Factory 4 Outfit (Lest), Kaguya’s Rune Factory 4 Outfit (Frey)
  • “Seasons of Love Bundle” downloadable content:
  • Pilika’s Bonding Stories
  • Cuilang’s Bonding Stories
  • “Marvelous Swimsuit Bundle” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Subaru’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kaguya’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Iroha’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Hina’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Murasame’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Ulalaka’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Mauro’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kurama’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kai’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Fubuki’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Matsuri’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Ikaruga’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Clarice’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kanata’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Pilika’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Cuilang’s Marvelous Swimsuit
  • “Festive Attire and Dark Woolby Bundle” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Subaru’s Festive Attire
    • Kaguya’s Festive Attire
    • Dark Woolby

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma Super Digital Deluxe Edition (pre-order on Nintendo Switch; wishlist on PC)

  • Digital Deluxe Edition contents
  • Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma digital soundtrack
  • Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma digital art book

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma “Digital Deluxe downloadable content” Set (Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PC)

  • “Seasons of Love Bundle”: Digital Artbook
  • Pilika’s Bonding Stories
  • Cuilang’s Bonding Stories
  • “Marvelous Swimsuit Bundle” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Subaru’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kaguya’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Iroha’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Hina’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Murasame’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Ulalaka’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Mauro’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kurama’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kai’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Fubuki’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Matsuri’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Ikaruga’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Clarice’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Kanata’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Pilika’s Marvelous Swimsuit
    • Cuilang’s Marvelous Swimsuit
  • “Festive Attire and Dark Woolby Bundle” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Subaru’s Festive Attire
    • Kaguya’s Festive Attire
    • Dark Woolby

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma “Super Digital Deluxe downloadable content” Set (Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PC)

  • “Digital Deluxe downloadable content” Set contents
  • Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma digital soundtrack
  • Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma digital art book

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar

  • ❮
  • ❯

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar is available for pre-order digitally on Nintendo eShop for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

The standard edition will be available to pre-order for $49.99 on Nintendo Switch and $59.99 on Nintendo Switch 2. A Digital Deluxe Edition will be available to pre-order for $59.98 on Nintendo Switch; and a Super Digital Deluxe edition will be available to pre-order for $69.98 on Nintendo Switch. Players can also purchase the “Trunk of Transformation Bundle” downloadable content separately beginning at launch for $9.99.

At launch, Nintendo Switch 2 players can also upgrade their Nintendo Switch 2 standard edition with the “Trunk of Transformation Bundle” downloadable content for $9.99, or a “Super Digital Deluxe” downloadable content set for $19.99.

The Nintendo Switch 2 Upgrade Pack will also be available for pre-order for $10 for anyone that owns either the physical or digital Nintendo Switch version of Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar. The full details of each digital edition are available below.

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar Digital Standard Edition (pre-order on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2; wishlist on PC):

  • Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar base game
  • “Cow Set” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Cow Costume
    • Cow Headwear
    • Cow Glider

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar Digital Deluxe Edition (pre-order on Nintendo Switch; wishlist on PC):

  • Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar base game
  • “Cow Set” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Cow Costume
    • Cow Headwear
    • Cow Glider
  • “Trunk of Transformation” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Chick Costume (Yellow)
    • Chick Headwear (Yellow)
    • Chick Costume (Black)
    • Chick Headwear (Black)
    • Alpaca Costume (White)
    • Alpaca Headwear (White)
    • Alpaca Costume (Brown)
    • Alpaca Headwear (Brown)
    • Ninja Outfit
    • Ninja Glider
    • Ninja Bazaar Set
    • Braid & Flowers
    • Cat Ear Buns with Highlights
    • Short Perm
    • Side Part with Highlights

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar Super Digital Deluxe Edition (pre-order on Nintendo Switch; wishlist on PC):

  • Digital Deluxe Edition contents
  • Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar digital art book
  • Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar digital soundtrack

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar “Trunk of Transformation Bundle” downloadable content (Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PC):

  • “Trunk of Transformation” cosmetic downloadable content
    • Chick Costume (Yellow)
    • Chick Headwear (Yellow)
    • Chick Costume (Black)
    • Chick Headwear (Black)
    • Alpaca Costume (White)
    • Alpaca Headwear (White)
    • Alpaca Costume (Brown)
    • Alpaca Headwear (Brown)
    • Ninja Outfit
    • Ninja Glider
    • Ninja Bazaar Set
    • Braid & Flowers
    • Cat Ear Buns with Highlights
    • Short Perm
    • Side Part with Highlights

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar “Super Digital Deluxe downloadable content” Set (Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PC):

  • “Trunk of Transformation Bundle” downloadable content
  • Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar digital soundtrack
  • Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar digital art book

Watch a new set of trailers below.
